verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You don't have to worry, about the problems you face
You don't have to carry, all those burdens alone
There's someone who can carry, every problem that you face
You can call him, my miracle worker
He's here in this church today

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Miracle worker, mender of destiny
working in us, mending our lives
Miracle worker, mender of destiny
Changing all odds, working things out

verse.name: o1
verse.lines:
He's a miracle worker
(worker)
Jesus is our miracle
(worker)
Changing our destiny
(worker)
Jesus is our miracle
(worker)
